figure;

plot(x_grid_error_log10_stds, y_grid_average_total_errors, 'LineWidth', 2);
hold on;
plot(x_ibmq_rochester_error_log10_stds, y_ibmq_rochester_average_total_errors, 'LineWidth', 2);
hold on;
plot(x_ibmq_paris_error_log10_stds, y_ibmq_paris_average_total_errors, 'LineWidth', 2);
hold on;
plot(x_rigetti_acorn_error_log10_stds, y_rigetti_acorn_average_total_errors, 'LineWidth', 2);
hold on;
plot(x_ibmq_poughkeepsie_error_log10_stds, y_ibmq_poughkeepsie_average_total_errors, 'LineWidth', 2);
hold on;
plot(x_ibmq_melbourne_error_log10_stds, y_ibmq_melbourne_average_total_errors, 'LineWidth', 2);
grid on
set(gcf,'color','w');
legend('64Q Grid 8x8', '53Q IBM Q Rochester', '27Q IBM Q Paris', '20Q Rigetti Acorn', '20Q IBM Q Poughkeepsie', '15Q IBM Q Melbourne', 'Location', 'Best');
title('Cost of implementation');
xlabel('log_{10} error std');
ylabel('Average total error');
ylim([0 1]);
